wordGroup: privately owned 私营的；私人拥有的

sentences.en: Most of the apartments are privately owned.
sentences.cn: 多数公寓房都是私人的。

sentences.en: I spoke privately to the candidate after the oral.
sentences.cn: 口试结束后，我私下和那个考生说了几句话。

sentences.en: Privately, she worries about whether she's really good enough.
sentences.cn: 私下里，她担心她是不是真的够好。
